allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove wallet files from git tracking

Remove my-wallet.json and shielded-wallet.json from version control
and add them to .gitignore to prevent accidental commits.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit --no-gpg-sign -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove wallet files from git tracking

Remove my-wallet.json and shielded-wallet.json from version control
and add them to .gitignore to prevent accidental commits.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: auto-detect chain reset and rescan wallet from genesis

When the chain height is lower than the wallet''s last scanned height,
automatically clear notes and rescan from block 0.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c user.email="noreply@anthropic.com" -c user.name="Claude" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge origin/main: combine SIMD mining with Circom verification

Resolved merge conflict to keep both:
- SIMD mining support from origin/main
- CircomVerifyingParams for ZK proof verification

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c user.email="noreply@anthropic.com" -c user.name="Claude" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Docker build includes miner_monitor binary and ZK verification keys

- Create dummy src/bin/miner_monitor.rs for dependency caching step
- Copy circuits/build/*.json verification keys for ZK proof verification

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false -c user.email="noreply@anthropic.com" -c user.name="Claude" add Dockerfile)

Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false -c user.email="noreply@anthropic.com" -c user.name="Claude" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Docker build includes miner_monitor binary and ZK verification keys

- Create dummy src/bin/miner_monitor.rs for dependency caching step
- Copy circuits verification keys for ZK proof verification

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false -c user.email="noreply@anthropic.com" -c user.name="Claude" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: copy verification keys to circuits/build/ path expected by main.rs

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: serve landing page at root path

Move "/" route from api_routes \(plain text\) to ui_routes \(React app\)
so the landing page renders correctly at postera.network.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: serve landing page at root path

Move "/" route from api_routes \(plain text\) to ui_routes \(React app\)
so the landing page renders correctly at postera.network.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: serve logo.png and vite.svg at root path

Add routes for root-level static files so the landing page
logo displays correctly.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c commit.gpgsign=false commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add favicon using logo.png

- Update index.html to use logo.png as favicon
- Add apple-touch-icon for mobile devices
- Serve /favicon.ico for legacy browser support

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
